import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./BebidasHeladas.css"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faBroom, faCheckCircle, faTimesCircle } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { library } from '@fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core'; library.add(faCheckCircle, faTimesCircle, faBroom); import { emailValidation, minLengthValidation } from '../../Utils/formValidation'; export default function AgregarBebidasHeladas() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ inpCodigo: "", inpNombre: "", inpIngredientes: "", inpPrecio: "", SelectRest: "", inpDescrip: "" }); const changeForm = e => { setInputs({ ...inputs, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; //VALIDAR FROMULARIOS const [formValid, setFormValid] = useState({ Codigo: false, Nombre: false, Ingredientes: false, Precio: false, selectRestaurante: false, Descrip: false }) const show = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(inputs); } return ( <>
